entry.title: Group Twitterbot is broken. :-(
entry.summary: Twitter updated how direct messages are emailed, so my Group Twitterbot code is now broken. I'm hopefully going to be able to work on it this week. I'm planning on fixed this problem and set it up so it's more stand alone, you'll be able to use it anywhere you â€¦
entry.content:
Twitter updated how direct messages are emailed, so my Group Twitterbot code is now broken. I'm hopefully going to be able to work on it this week. I'm planning on fixed this problem and set it up so it's more stand alone, you'll be able to use it anywhere you can have a php based web page.

![][]
